DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to examine patient's perspective of symptom control and impact of gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD) on daily life.
DOC.brief_title: An Epidemiological Study to Describe Symptom Control and Impact of Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease
